verbs.description: [ARG0: Keith Schiller] [V: said] [ARG1: he viewed the offer as a joke and turned it down] , and he and Trump laughed about it .
Keith Schiller said [ARG0: he] [V: viewed] [ARG1: the offer] [ARG2: as a joke] and turned it down , and he and Trump laughed about it .
Keith Schiller said [ARG0: he] viewed the offer as a joke and [V: turned] [ARG1: it] down , and he and Trump laughed about it .
Keith Schiller said he viewed the offer as a joke and turned it down , and [ARG0: he and Trump] [V: laughed] [ARG1: about it] .
